         MACRO
         AOFNTRY
***********************************************************************
*                                                                     *
* Description of AOF entry generated by the TABENTRY macro.           *
*                                                                     *
***********************************************************************
AOFNTRY  DSECT
AOFNXT   DS    A                   Ptr to next phy entry
AOFBNXT  DS    A                   Ptr to next identical entry
AOFMSGID DS    CL12                Message id (first 8 chars) or '*'
AOFACTN  DS    CL8                 Action function
*                                   'POST' A waiting OSWAIT command
*                                   'NONE' Perform no action
*                                   'OSCMD' Issue command
*                                   'OSCMDT' WTO command (test mode)
*                                   'REPLY' Use text to reply to WTOR
AOFTESTP DS    A                   Ptr to test blocks
AOFNTRCT DS    AL2                 Entry number in load module
AOFECHO  DS    CL2                 Echo parameter
*                                    'YE'  yes echo to console
*                                    'NO'  no suppress from console
*                                    'LO'  log to syslog
AOFMLIM  DS    AL4                 Matchlim count
AOFENTR  DS    CL8                 Entry name, either label or
*                                   Generated name 'ENTRN'
AOFAORP  DS    0X                  Different segments for actions
*
**       For ACTION=OSCMD, ACTION=OSCMDT, ACTION=REPLY
*
AOFACTL  DS    AL2                 Length of action text
AOFACT   DS    0C                  Start of action text
         EJECT
ATSNTRY  DSECT ,                   Test operand entry
ATSNXT   DS    A                   Ptr to next test entry
ATSTYPE  DS    CL2                 Test type
*                                    'W ' word type test
*                                    'WX' word exclude test
*                                    'S ' substring type test
*                                    'SX' substring exclude test
*                                    'L ' line number test
*                                    'D ' descriptor code number test
         DS    CL2                 Reserved
ATSWORD  DS    A                   Word number
ATSSUBST EQU   ATSWORD             Substring character position
ATSLINE  EQU   ATSWORD             Line number
ATSDESC  EQU   ATSWORD             Descriptor codes
ATSDESC1 EQU   ATSWORD             First descriptor code byte
ATSDESC2 EQU   ATSWORD+1           Second descriptor code byte
ATSEXTN  DS    0X                  Start of variable extensions
*
**       Extension for character tests (word, substring)
*
ATSLNGTH DS    A                   Length of substring
ATSSEPS  DS    CL4                 Parse separators
ATSTXTL  DS    H                   Length of text
ATSTXT   DS    0C                  Text to compare
         MEND
